plot: The Queen gives Charles the green light to wed Camilla. Tasked with planning her own funeral ahead of her 80th birthday, she faces an existential crisis.

The monarch Queen Elizabeth II (Imelda Staunton) planning her funeral. And all this is happening amidst the tragic death of her sister (Princess Margaret) and mother (Queen Elizabeth the Queen Mother). Meanwhile, the young royals - William (Ed McVey) and Harry (Luther Ford), had a chaotic Halloween party, which led to scandalous newspaper headlines. Whereas their father, Prince Charles (Dominic West), tries to convince Queen Elizabeth II to give him and Camilla Parker Bowles (Olivia Williams) permission to marry.—Sahdev Kunwar
